posts.post_content:
I received a gift of cash for Christmas that was earmarked for baseball cards.  As my mother-in-law recognizes my passion, but has no idea how to buy cards.  I am hoping that I can put it to good use in acquiring a T206 Nap Lajoie w/bat card for my collection.

 I do not care what back it has.  I generally prefer non-creased cards, but if the price is right I will consider any condition.  I collect both graded and ungraded cards.

What does Net54 have available?  Feel free to contact me anyway you wish.

Thanks,
Rich

All PMs have been answered.  I am waiting for a few more scans before I make a decision.

Thanks,
Rich
